visualization_prompt: Generate a column chart showing monthly revenue growth from social media marketing using a time-series column chart with annotated trend insights

title.text: Social Media Marketing Has Grown Revenue by 27% in Past 3 Months

visualization_explanation: The dataset contains univariate time-series data with 10 monthly observations. Categorical x-axis represents months (nominal scale), while the quantitative y-axis measures revenue in thousands (ratio scale). Synthetic data follows a positive trend (μ=24.3, σ=2.6) with intentional July dip to simulate real-world fluctuations. The 27% growth claim is anchored in Oct/Jul comparison from 22k to 28k. Column chart maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating gridlines and legend while maintaining Tufte's principle of proportional ink. Cairo's perceptual topology is honored through consistent spatial intervals and color constancy (#4A90E2). Value labels use +X% format to emphasize cumulative growth, while y-axis ticks maintain proportional scaling for accurate magnitude judgments.
